job_title: Certified Nurse's Aide (CNA) in Akron, NY
pros: The certification is done right at the nursing home, the facility is the cleanest nursing home I have ever been to. Good people. Most employees are offered in addition to training a signing bonus if they stay for at least 3 months.
cons: The pay is horrible. Starting pay is very low with very very small pay increases over time. If yo call in sick at all the signing bonus is taken off the table even if you have a doctors note.

review_title: Wonderful staff and awesome working with residents!
